projects.title: MerlinDoc
projects.desc: Medical Directory App built with MERN stack. User can search a list of doctors based on the chosen state. There is an autocomplete feature & redux store is persisted if user refresh their browser.

projects.title: MerlinStore Client
projects.desc: An ebook store app built with React & Redux, and in the back-end there is a REST API built with Express & MongoDB. User can add product to the cart, pay them with paypal then receive the download link. You can use the following test account. Email : test@gmail.com Password: 123456

projects.title: MerlinDash
projects.desc: Concept Website for Push Notifications App built with ReactJS. Designed for the large screen.

projects.title: Battleship
projects.desc: Battleship game built using Javascript, Webpack,HTML & CSS.

projects.title: MerlinBook
projects.desc: Front End for Bookstore CMS Built with React Redux for the front-end, and have two version of API built using two different    stack. Which is MERN stack and Ruby on Rails.
